Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Design/Decorating | Family | How To/Do It Yourself
Status: New Series
Network: HGTV ( USA)

For a shot at a $10,000 grand prize, some of the country's most successful designers and artists must design 10' by 10' white rooms using such outrageous elements as candy treats, dumpster-dived treasures or more than 1,500 flowers. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31570)
